flawed_nl_solution:
In three years, Michael will have 30+100 = <<30+100=310>>310 trophies.
If Michael has 30 trophies now, Jack will have 10*30 = <<30*10=300>>300 in three years.
Altogether, Jack and Michael will have 300+310 = <<300+310=610>>610 handball trophies in three years.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 310. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
